content:
#  Annual progress report -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/doctoral-students/annual-progress-report
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:53

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Annual progress report 

According to §7(1)(7) of 
The AGH Doctoral School Regulations
, doctoral students are obliged to submit annual report including supervisors' opinion on progress in completion of the Individual Programme of Study and the Individual Research Plan.

Hence, we kindly ask you to submit your reports for the academic year 2023/2024 
by 15 of September 2024
, using the form available below.

Stopka

AGH University Doctoral School
build. A3, I floor, room 118
al. Mickiewicza 30
30-059 Krakow

Office for Doctoral Students' Affairs
 E-mail: phd@agh.edu.pl
